attributes.action: Reverse the decision to hand over the management of gas installers from CORGI to Capita
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: CORGI (The Council Of Registered Gas Installers) have a proven and impressive track record. Their name is well known and rightly trusted by the public. Please don't hand it over to Capita (who really really really do not have a good track record). It is very worrying indeed. It wasn't broken. Please don't fix it

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
